public class SlashRemindCommands : MewdekoSlashModuleBase<RemindService>, IInteractionModuleBase

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

Channel(ITextChannel, TimeSpan, string?)

Sends a reminder to a specified channel.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("channel", "Send a reminder to this channel.", false, RunMode.Default)]
[UserPerm(ChannelPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task Channel(ITextChannel channel, TimeSpan time, string? reminder = "")
Parameters
Type Name Description
ITextChannel channel

The target channel for the reminder.
TimeSpan time

When the reminder should trigger.
string reminder

The message for the reminder. If empty, prompts the user to input the reminder text.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of adding a reminder to a specific channel.
| Edit this page View Source

Declaration

The page of reminders to display, starting at 1.

The index of the reminder to delete, as displayed in the reminder list.

ReminderModal(string, string, string, ReminderModal)

Handles the modal interaction for creating a reminder.

Declaration
[ModalInteraction("remind:*,*,*;", true, RunMode.Default)]
public Task ReminderModal(string sId, string sPri, string sTime, ReminderModal modal)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string sId

The target ID for the reminder, either a user or a channel.
string sPri

Indicates if the reminder is private.
string sTime

The time when the reminder should trigger.
ReminderModal modal

The modal containing the reminder text.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of processing the reminder modal submission.
